data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ofori-Boateng, Caleb, Leaché, Adam D., Obeng-Kankam, Bright, Kouamé, N’Goran Germain, Hillers, Annika, Rödel, Mark-Oliver (2018): A new species of Puddle Frog, genus Phrynobatrachus (Amphibia: Anura: Phrynobatrachidae) from Ghana. Zootaxa 4374 (4): 565-578, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4374.4.6|4 occurrences
